lead_paragraph: The “30 Seconds With” column last Sunday, featuring an interview with Devin Hester of the Chicago Bears, misspelled the surname of a teammate. He is Jason McKie, not McKee.
snippet: The “30 Seconds With” column last Sunday, featuring an interview with Devin Hester of the Chicago Bears, misspelled the surname of a teammate. He is Jason McKie, not McKee.
